About Me

Let me tell you a bit about myself...

BIO

Ambitious and focused computer programmer, body builder, and historical European martial artist with a passion for continuous learning and growth. Always looking for new and exciting challenges to test myself and grow ever stronger. As a programmer, I am familiar not only with high level programming langauges like Java, Python, and C++ but I am also exeprienced with relational databases utilizing SQL and machine learning model development using powerful Python data science libraries like scikit-learn, numpy, and pandas. My personal goal throughout life is to become a warrior scholar, someone with physical strength, martial skill, and intellectual curiosity. To that end then, when I am not nurturing my intellectual curiosity as a programmer I am either in the gym cultivating strength as an ameuture bodybuilder or sharpening my martial skills as a German longsword fencer. It is an identity that I relish in pursuing because it means that everyday I can become stronger and more competent, allowing me to better support my friends and provide for my family. Having graduated from the University of Calgary with a Bachelor of Science degree in Computer Science, my greatest career aspiration is to become a proficient data scientist and machine larning developer putting my knowledge and skills to work in the Renewable Energy Industry.

Liquor Depot

Cashier/Stocker/Cleaner

Processed cash and credit sales transactions for customers. Organized, stocked, and cleaned store. Assisted customers with finding products and suggesting novel products. Summarized cash sales, secured safe, and locked down store at end of shift.

Brewers Distributor Limited

Floor Worker

Picked large orders with electric rider pallet jack, wrapped them, then loaded them onto trucks. Offloaded trucks returning from delivery. Went out with delivery drivers and assisted with offloading orders. Helped clean warehouse floor at end of shift.

Vermillion Power Technologies

Coder, Intern

Wrote programming scripts allowing computers to interface with external multimeter hardware. Implemented and maintained an inventory database using MS SharePoint, MS Access, and Visual basic. Helped author documents concerning company coding procedures and workflow. Performed video editing to create videos demonstrating products and systems to stakeholders.
